name: Geisler Michael
description: Our house is situated in the sub district of Hollenzen, approx. 2km from Mayrhofen town centre, in a sunny and quiet spot, approx. 100m from the ski bus stop. The cross country ski trail passes directly past the house.
Price includes heating, electricity, TV, bed linen, towels, local taxes, bread delivery service on request. Excludes a final cleaning charge.
Turn left at the Firma Alko factory heading towards Hollenzen. First road on the right.

image.caption: Haus mit freier Sicht auf die Berge
Aussicht von den Wohnungen mit Balkon

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The apartment is approx. 70m², with it's own kitchen, 1 lounge, 2 bedrooms, large balcony with stunning views, additional WC. All rooms have a wooden ceiling and carpets, quiet position.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Gemütlich ausgestattete Wohnküche 15m² mit SAT/TV, Radio, Backrohr, Mikrowelle, 2 Schlafzimmer, Du/WC, Diele, Abstellraum, Parkplatz
beim Haus, Balkon mit freiem Ausblick, ruhige Lage, Geschirr, Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Ortstaxe, Strom im Preis ingebriffen.
